## Data Cleaning

```{r read-clean}

files     <- list.files("data", full.names = TRUE) 
zip_codes <- readr::parse_number(files) %>% unique() %>% as.character()

tbl <- files %>% 
  keep(str_detect(., '49315')) %>% 
  map(~ .x %>% 
        read_csv(show_col_types = FALSE) %>%
        drop_na() %>%
        janitor::clean_names() %>% 
        mutate(zipcode = readr::parse_number(.x),
               tract = row_number()) %>% 
        select(-c(census_tract, fips_code, formatted_fips))) %>% 
  reduce(left_join, by = c("zipcode", "tract")) %>% 
  group_by(zipcode) %>% 
  summarize_all(mean, na.rm = TRUE)

read_clean_zip <- function(zip) {
  
  files %>% 
    keep(str_detect(., zip)) %>% 
    map(~ .x %>% 
          read_csv(show_col_types = FALSE) %>%
          drop_na() %>%
          janitor::clean_names() %>% 
          mutate(zipcode = readr::parse_number(.x),
                 tract = row_number()) %>% 
          select(-c(census_tract, fips_code, formatted_fips))) %>% 
    reduce(left_join, by = c("zipcode", "tract")) %>% 
    group_by(zipcode) %>% 
    summarize_all(mean, na.rm = TRUE) %>% 
    select(-tract)
}

tbl <- zip_codes %>% 
  map_df(read_clean_zip)
```
